channel.title: Xerox/Corrupted-Minds718
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to Xerox/Corrupted-minds718.com advertisement thread I first started out with a 525 server back in 2010 called redemption525 & a 562 redemptionX562(runesourcebase), which had an average of 20-30 players, and then i decided to give up on it due to my paypal and email address accounts being compromised, but finnaly i return better then ever! With exciting new features that will make you want to play and play We hope you give us a chance, we promise you will not regret it!
Staff list
Administrators
D1vine (Co-owner)
Tom (Admin Support team)
Reaxion (Pro-website developer)
Support Team
[COLOR="#00FFFF"]Zenergyz
Spots open
Moderators
L A Z Z Y
Spots open
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4q3jo0.gif[/img]
Website [URL=http://"http://www.corrupted-minds.com"]Get started today at corrupted-minds.com[/URL]
Download Mirrors:
(jar client) [url=http://uppit.com/7poswgwiq9iq/Xerox-Legacy.jar]Download Xerox.Legacy.jar @ UppIT[/url]
[url=https://mega.co.nz/#!CIpGDKDJ!DCDEoERFNmrCzfZI6itQc0CpqyAHU7TO2LSVXaGhmRA]https://mega.co.nz/#!CIpGDKDJ!DCDEoERFNmrCzfZI6itQc0CpqyAHU7TO2LSVXaGhmRA[/url]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/eeebwjhyxpfic1e/Xerox-Legacy.rar]Xerox-Legacy.rar[/url]
[url=http://up.ht/14dD58G]Download Xerox.Legacy.rar @ UppIT[/url] Uppit link
Base: Matrix/Rune-Evolution Revision: 718 Name: Xerox/corrupted-Minds718
I have been coding this server for around about 2 weeks now, i've added quite abit of extra content, fixed a few bugs here and there, also fixed some major dupes What i've done so far:
[COLOR="#00FF00"]- Ganodermic beasts - Xlog/trade/duelarena/shop dupes fixed - Correct korasi method - Fixed dragonkk/fagg/apache hack - Added non donor yell system so it requires 1500 total level to yell for Non-Donators - Completetionist cape rack - Admin Control panel - Added 4 new custom bosses mage of malice mage of catastrohpy, thunder dung boss, and blink dungeoneering boss - Added a fully working prestige system with 10 ranks, and a special title for max prestiges - Changed squeal of fortune loots - Killstreak system with rewards implemented - Added dungeoneering ticket system to dominion tower - Added diango for buying spin tickets - Fixed starter bug causing people to get stuck at home,being unable to move, and not being able to logout - Working lodestones(need correct interface) - - Crystal chest with basic rewards - View stats button - Skilling points system+mystery boxes - Removed buttonhandler & inventory options cmd spam
-Grandexchange(BETA)(ALL PRICES NEED RECODING) - Construction base - Shooting stars & Fixed stars not deleting when changing stage - Made corrupt gear untradeable & donators get a special bonus, there pvp armour does not degrade while wearing/in combat - Fixed up a few bugs with the teleport handling hidden admins can no longer trade and only 1 session is aloud per ip - Deathtouched darts - Report abuse added sending a world message to all staff & saving logs of the reports - Slayer points & shop - Zombies minigame[/COLOR]
What i need to do:
[COLOR="#FF0000"] -Strykewyrms -auto donation system -auto vote system -a few minior bug fixes -Make a start on farming -Make construction Work propperly -Finish of dungeoneering -I will post more as i think about what needs to be done[/COLOR]
Some media of what i've added:
Prestige system
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1tjv6c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/16lwp43.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/w8p6qq.jpg[/img]
LodeStone Network (unfinished)
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1tjv6c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/16lwp43.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/w8p6qq.jpg[/img]
Check stats button
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/23hp2t5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/312zebq.png[/img]
Bosses( i know some of these where already on this source, but i have re-done all the damages defence bonuses attack bonuses animations ect. ect.)
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2dc6976.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/23wr41k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1z9d87.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/dnlpow.png[/img]
Zombie-Mini (Not perfected, uses fightcaves as a base but doesnt interfere with it
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/154y849.png[/img]
Crystal chest with basic reward system
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/av0und.png[/img]
Deathtouched darts
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/14noety.png[/img]
Killstreak system with rewards implemented
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/29xayhd.png[/img]
Lumbridge catacombs (I got bored so yeah:))
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/mscbd4.png[/img]
Slayer shop
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/30ifgvo.png[/img]
Mystery boxes and skillpoints [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/zyepdx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2w3qc1y.png[/img]
shooting stars with all stages
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/slrwif.png[/img]
And thats basicly all i can tell you, the rest you'll have to come find out for your self if your thinking about joining, Thanks alot for taking your time to read this to the rune-server community i hope you give us a thought!

item.title: Xerox/Corrupted-Minds718
item.dc:creator: @im_insane im insane
item.description:
@im_insane wrote:

Hello and welcome to Xerox/Corrupted-minds718.com advertisement thread
I first started out with a 525 server back in 2010 called redemption525 & a 562 redemptionX562(runesourcebase), which had an average of 20-30 players, and then i decided to give up on it due to my paypal and email address accounts being compromised, but finnaly i return better then ever!
With exciting new features that will make you want to play and play We hope you give us a chance, we promise you will not regret it!

Staff list

Administrators

D1vine (Co-owner)

Tom (Admin Support team)

Reaxion (Pro-website developer)

Support Team

Website Get started today at corrupted-minds.com

Xerox-Legacy.rar

Download Xerox.Legacy.rar @ UppIT
Uppit link

Base: Matrix/Rune-Evolution
Revision: 718
Name: Xerox/corrupted-Minds718

I have been coding this server for around about 2 weeks now, i’ve added quite abit of extra content, fixed a few bugs here and there, also fixed some major dupes
What i’ve done so far:

[COLOR="#00FF00"]- Ganodermic beasts

  • Xlog/trade/duelarena/shop dupes fixed
  • Correct korasi method
  • Fixed dragonkk/fagg/apache hack
  • Added non donor yell system so it requires 1500 total level to yell for Non-Donators
  • Completetionist cape rack
  • Admin Control panel
  • Added 4 new custom bosses mage of malice mage of catastrohpy, thunder dung boss, and blink dungeoneering boss
  • Added a fully working prestige system with 10 ranks, and a special title for max prestiges
  • Changed squeal of fortune loots
  • Killstreak system with rewards implemented
  • Added dungeoneering ticket system to dominion tower
  • Added diango for buying spin tickets
  • Fixed starter bug causing people to get stuck at home,being unable to move, and not being able to logout
  • Working lodestones(need correct interface) -
  • Crystal chest with basic rewards
  • View stats button
  • Skilling points system+mystery boxes
  • Removed buttonhandler & inventory options cmd spam

-Grandexchange(BETA)(ALL PRICES NEED RECODING)

  • Construction base
  • Shooting stars & Fixed stars not deleting when changing stage
  • Made corrupt gear untradeable & donators get a special bonus, there pvp armour does not degrade while wearing/in combat
  • Fixed up a few bugs with the teleport handling hidden admins can no longer trade and only 1 session is aloud per ip
  • Deathtouched darts
  • Report abuse added sending a world message to all staff & saving logs of the reports
  • Slayer points & shop
  • Zombies minigame[/COLOR]

What i need to do:

[COLOR="#FF0000"]
-Strykewyrms
-auto donation system
-auto vote system
-a few minior bug fixes
-Make a start on farming
-Make construction Work propperly
-Finish of dungeoneering
-I will post more as i think about what needs to be done[/COLOR]

Some media of what i’ve added:

Prestige system

LodeStone Network (unfinished)

Check stats button

Bosses( i know some of these where already on this source, but i have re-done all the damages defence bonuses attack bonuses animations ect. ect.)

Zombie-Mini (Not perfected, uses fightcaves as a base but doesnt interfere with it

Crystal chest with basic reward system

av0und.png691×336

Deathtouched darts

Killstreak system with rewards implemented

Lumbridge catacombs (I got bored so yeah:))

mscbd4.png788×385

Slayer shop

Mystery boxes and skillpoints

shooting stars with all stages

And thats basicly all i can tell you, the rest you’ll have to come find out for your self if your thinking about joining,
Thanks alot for taking your time to read this to the rune-server community i hope you give us a thought!
